Header.title: Gritview.io
Header.paragraph: Guide to assist you in making informed decisions on courses you plan to take at the University of Maryland, Baltimore County (UMBC)

Footer.preliminary: Gritview is a platform built to assist students and faculty retrieve data regarding course grades, course evaluations, and professors @ UMBC.
Footer.ground: Grade and course evaluation data provided on this platform is directly obtained from the University of Maryland, Baltimore County.
